answer: There is no unique article "in-depth analysis of the importance and development directions of interdisciplinary scientific research within the context of global trends, specifically focusing on the year 2025," as the "Global Trends 2025: A Transformed World" report published in 2008 by the US National Intelligence Council provides a summary of global trends for 2025, not an in-depth analysis of interdisciplinary scientific research within that context.
ground_truth: Research World 2025年度趋势分析文章
